text: Ratodero is the capital of Ratodero Taluka a sub-division of Larkana District in the Sindh province of Pakistan. It is located some 30 km away from the district capital Larkana. ==Administration== Ratodero Taluka is administratively subdivided into 9 Union Councils two of which form the town of Ratodero these are: *Ratodero-I *Ratodero-II ==Famous People== There have been many people from Ratodero including two former Prime Ministers - Zulfikar and Benazir Bhutto. Hazrat Sufi Ghamdil sain ==References== Category:Cities in Sindh Category:Tehsils of Larkana District
title: Ratodero
